name: Octogris
short_description:
The development of this plugin has been stopped. To obtain the most updated version of the plugin, visit:
https://sourceforge.net/projects/octogris/

Octogris is a sound spatializer Audio Unit plugin (Mac only) that works up to 32 sources -> 32 speakers, but it was primarily designed to make octophony with visual feedback and many different movement modes.

It has been developed at the Faculté de musique of the Université de Montréal by the Groupe de recherche en immersion spatiale (GRIS). 

It has been tested with Digital Performer, Logic and Reaper. It works in OSX 10.6 and 10.7. The actual version (1.5) is 64 bits and is  32 bits compatible. So far, our tests indicate that it still works under OS X 10.8, 10.9 and 10.10 in recent generation DAWs.

To install it, drag-and-drop into: /Library/Audio/Components folder of your Mac. 
Don't forget to install "DDHidLib.framework" into: /System/Library/Frameworks. 

French and English manuals are available.
summary: A Sound Spatializer Audio Unit Plugin
